title: Faruk Yiğit
text:
Faruk Yiğit (born 15 April 1968 in <a href="Trabzon">Trabzon</a>) was a Turkish <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
He played for several clubs, including <a href="Orhangazi%20Gen%C3%A7lerbirli%C4%9Fi">Orhangazi Gençlerbirliği</a>, <a href="Yalovaspor">Yalovaspor</a>, <a href="Boluspor">Boluspor</a>, <a href="Kocaelispor">Kocaelispor</a>, <a href="Fenerbah%C3%A7e">Fenerbahçe</a>, <a href="Ankarag%C3%BCc%C3%BC">Ankaragücü</a> and <a href="Diyarbak%C4%B1rspor">Diyarbakırspor</a>.
He played for <a href="Turkey%20national%20football%20team">Turkey national football team</a> and was a participant at the <a href="1996%20UEFA%20European%20Championship">1996 UEFA European Championship</a>.
Honours.
Kocaelispor
